alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Lamar; Marion; Pickens; Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 30 at 3:54AM CDT until March 30 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, sustained winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, sustained winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Marion, Lamar, Fayette, Winston and Pickens Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 5 PM this afternoon to 10 PM CDT this evening. For the Wind Advisory, from 9 AM this morning to 5 PM CDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Strong wind gusts will blow down trees, possibly leading to widespread power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
